channel.title: Somethign wrong with case 155?

item.title: Somethign wrong with case 155?
item.dc:creator: @kevin5475845 kevin5475845
item.description:
@kevin5475845 wrote:

ok i have added some npc’s to my server that talks but when i click on the its says on runserver this

AtNPC 1: 1774

something like that but it does like that on every npc almost i add
the npc id’s is 731 and 1835

and here is the code for them

else if (NPCID == 731) { // Bartender
skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
addItem(1917,1); // Beer
NpcWanneTalk = 731;
}



				else if (NPCID == 1835) 
				{    //Easter bunny   
               if (easter == false)
	{
	sendMessage("Easter Bunny Won't Give You Ring Of Chaors(u)");
	sendMessage("You have to find his friend to get it");
	}
	else
	{
	addItem(6465, 1);
	sendMessage("Easter Bunny Gives you a Ring Of Charos(u)");
	}

}
